name: accessionNumberSUSMirri
displayName: Unique identifier of the strain in the CC.

name: organismTypeSUSMirri
displayName: The organism type of the microorganism

name: speciesSUSMirri
displayName: The species of the strain followed, when appropriate, by the subspecies name. For hybrid strains, more than one species can be specified. The semicolon “;” must be used as a separation character.

name: beforeNagoyaSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain has been collected before 12 October 2014.

name: useRestrictionsSUSMirri
displayName: Report if the strain can be used for commercial development or not.

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
displayName: Situation of the strain in relation to the Nagoya protocol. Mandatory if BeforeNagoya is ‘No’.

name: riskGroupSUSMirri
displayName: Risk group according to EU Directive 2000/54/EC and its amendments and corrections. Mandatory if the species is known.

name: formOfSupplySUSMirri
displayName: The forms of supply of the strain to users.

name: recommendedMediumGrowthSUSMirri
displayName: The acronym of the growth medium.

name: recommendedTempGrowthSUSMirri
displayName: The recommended growing temperature for the strain. The temperature is expressed as an integer number in Celsius degrees. The symbol ° and the letter C must not be included.

name: euQuarantineSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain is subject to quarantine according to the European Directive 2000/29/CE and its amendments and corrections. The list of quarantine organisms is available in the Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2019/2072. Mandatory if the species is known.

name: gmoSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain is a GMO (Genetically Modified Organism).

name: gmoConstructionInfoSUSMirri
displayName: Information on the construction of the GMO. This information is mandatory for strains with GMO=Yes, while it must be missing for strains with GMO=No.

name: dualUseSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain has the potential for a harmful use according to EU Council Regulation 2000/1334/CE and its amendments and corrections. Mandatory if the species is known.

name: sexualStateSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies Information on strain sexual state / mating type, for relevant resource types.

name: testedTempGrowthRangeSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies the lowest and the highest temperature at which the strain was tested for growing. Temperatures are expressed as integer numbers in Celsius degrees and must be separated by a semicolon. The symbol ° and the letter C must not be included.

name: typeStrainSUSMirri
displayName: The attribute specifies whether the strain is a type strain.

name: useRestrictionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: For commercial development a special agreement is requested

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: No known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: Documents providing proof of legal access and terms of use available at the collection

name: nagoyaConditionsSUSMirri
dataverseAlias: Strain probably in scope, please contact the culture collection
